meta.label: Custom API Keys
meta.description: Define a preset that DSS users can use to authenticate themselves on the Custom API endpoint. The plugin will work with per-user credentials.

params.name: header1_key
params.label: Custom Header 1 Key
params.description: Custom HTTP header name (optional, per user)

params.name: header1_value
params.label: Custom Header 1 Value
params.description: Custom HTTP header value (optional, per user)
